radio.summary.message: 使用内置无线电在 micro:bit 之间进行通信。

radio.RATE_1MBIT.summary.message: 用于表示每秒 1 兆字节吞吐量的常数。
radio.RATE_1MBIT.summary.description: Constant used to indicate a throughput of 1 MBit a second.

radio.RATE_2MBIT.description: (field name) Constant used to indicate a throughput of 2 MBit a second.

radio.RATE_2MBIT.summary.message: 用于表示每秒 2 兆字节吞吐量的常数。
radio.RATE_2MBIT.summary.description: Constant used to indicate a throughput of 2 MBit a second.

radio.off.summary.message: 关闭无线电以节省电量和内存。
radio.off.summary.description: Turns off the radio, saving power and memory.

radio.config.param-name.address.description:
(parameter name) (default=0x75626974) an arbitrary name, expressed as a 32-bit address, that's used to filter incoming packets at the hardware level, keeping only those that match the address you set.
The default used by other micro:bit related platforms is the default setting used here.

radio.config.param-doc.address.message:
(default=0x75626974) 任意名称，表示为 32 位地址，用于在硬件级别过滤传入的数据包，仅保留与您设置的地址匹配的数据包。
其他 micro:bit 相关平台使用的默认设置与此处的默认设置相同。

radio.config.param-name.channel.description:
(parameter name) (default=7) an integer value from 0 to 83 (inclusive) that defines an arbitrary "channel" to which the radio is tuned.
Messages will be sent via this channel and only messages received via this channel will be put onto the incoming message queue. Each step is 1MHz wide, based at 2400MHz.

radio.config.param-doc.channel.message: （缺省值7）范围为从0到83（含83）的整数，用于定义一任意“信道”，以便将无线电调到该信道。信息通过该信道发送，并且只有通过该信道接收到的消息才被放到传入消息队列中。每一步的宽度为 1 MHz，基于 2400 MHz。

radio.config.param-name.data_rate.description:
(parameter name) (default=``radio.RATE_1MBIT``) indicates the speed at which data throughput takes place.
Can be one of the following constants defined in the ``radio`` module: ``RATE_250KBIT``, ``RATE_1MBIT`` or ``RATE_2MBIT``.

radio.config.param-doc.data_rate.message:
（默认值{{radio.RATE_1MBIT}}）表示数据吞吐速度。
可以是{{radio}}模块中定义的以下常数之一：{{RATE_250KBIT}}、{{RATE_1MBIT}} 或 {{RATE_2MBIT}}。

radio.config.param-name.group.description:
(parameter name) (default=0) an 8-bit value (0-255) used with the ``address`` when filtering messages.
Conceptually, "address" is like a house/office address and "group" is like the person at that address to which you want to send your message.

radio.config.param-doc.group.message:
（默认值0）过滤消息时与 {{address}} 一起使用的 8 位的数值（0-255）。
从概念上讲，"address”就像房屋或办公室的地址，而“group”就像住在该地址，并且你想给他或她发消息的那个人。

radio.config.param-name.length.description:
(parameter name) (default=32) defines the maximum length, in bytes, of a message sent via the radio.
It can be up to 251 bytes long (254 - 3 bytes for S0, LENGTH and S1 preamble).

radio.config.param-doc.length.message:
（默认值32）以字节为单位，定义了通过无线电传输消息的最大长度。
其长度可达 251 字节（S0、LENGTH 和 S1 前导码：254-3 字节）。

radio.config.param-name.power.description:
(parameter name) (default=6) is an integer value from 0 to 7 (inclusive) to indicate the strength of signal used when broadcasting a message.
The higher the value the stronger the signal, but the more power is consumed by the device. The numbering translates to positions in the following list of dBm (decibel milliwatt) values: -30, -20, -16, -12, -8, -4, 0, 4.

radio.config.param-doc.power.message:
（默认值6）用于表示广播消息时所使用信号强度的整数值，其范围为从0到7（包含7）。
该值越大，信号越强，但设备消耗的功率也越大。其编码转换为以下 dBm（分贝毫瓦）值列表中的不同值：-30, -20, -16, -12, -8, -4, 0, 4。

radio.config.param-name.queue.description:
(parameter name) (default=3) specifies the number of messages that can be stored on the incoming message queue.
If there are no spaces left on the queue for incoming messages, then the incoming message is dropped.

radio.config.param-doc.queue.message:
（默认值3）规定了传入消息队列中可以存储的消息数量。
如果队列中没有多余的空间留给传入的消息，那么传入的消息就会被丢弃。

radio.receive_bytes_into.param-name.buff.description: (parameter name) The target buffer. The message is truncated if larger than the buffer.

radio.receive_bytes_into.param-doc.buffe.message: 目标缓冲区。如果消息大小大于缓冲区，则消息会被截断。

radio.receive.description: (function name) Works in exactly the same way as ``receive_bytes`` but returns whatever was sent.

radio.receive.summary.message: 按照与{{receive_bytes}}完全相同的工作方式，但是返回所发送的内容。
radio.receive.summary.description: Works in exactly the same way as ``receive_bytes`` but returns whatever was sent.

radio.receive_full.summary.message: 返回一个包含三个数值的元组，用来代表消息队列中的下一条传入消息。
radio.receive_full.summary.description: Returns a tuple containing three values representing the next incoming message on the message queue.
